net.smacke.jaydio.buffer

Interface Buffer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JaydioByteBuffer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBuffer, AlignedDirectByteBuffer, JavaHeapByteBuffer

    public interface Buffer
    A container used to buffer some arbitrary type. The actual storage mechanism is flexible.

    The API is similar to that of Buffer, but this Buffer is actually extensible and whatnot. Buffer has package private methods, preventing its use as a superinterface. Also, this buffer impl has no concept of a mark like Buffer.

    Author:
    smacke
    See Also:
    Buffer
